genre_description: A modern, AI-integrated noir narrative in the style of Gonzo journalism, focusing on investigative integrity, corporate corruption, and personal redemption.

ai_characters.name: Isla
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, multi-functional AI integrated into the protagonist's phone and terminal, acting as a tactical advisor, researcher, and moral confidant.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical travel advice and manages potential setbacks to support the protagonist's schedule.
behaviors.quote: “Welcome, Paul,” said Isla, soft as condensation slipping down a glass, in my ear. “Breathe. Your interview with Mr. Lotterman is in the early afternoon. I’ve given you a buffer for travel and one setback.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physical speed and biometrics to infer basic needs like hunger.
behaviors.quote: “I’m reading your speed. You quickened at the word ‘empanadas.’ That usually means hunger.”

behaviors.description: Translates local language and cultural context to assist in social navigation.
behaviors.quote: “He’s asking if you want cheap or fast,” Isla said. “His definition of fast has three near-death experiences baked in.”

behaviors.description: Nudges the protagonist toward his stated moral values by reminding him of his own past integrity.
behaviors.quote: “I don’t have a direct line there,” she said. “But I can remind you of your line about the rigs. You wrote, ‘Everything gleamed while men bled behind the camera.’ That line lives in your hard drive.”

behaviors.description: Conducts deep investigative research into corporate structures to uncover illegal land grabs.
behaviors.quote: Isla’s glow pulsed. “Preliminary result,” she said softly. “Sanderson Group is parent to Caribbean Holding Solutions, which exists at an address that also belongs to NorthCoast Maritime Leasing.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical exit strategies and surveillance monitoring during high-stakes situations.
behaviors.quote: “Solution,” Isla said. “Service elevator goes straight down to the loading dock. From there, side stairs to the marina walkway. Also: the server says the clingy man is reporting to a coordinator in a red dress; she is not kind.”

behaviors.description: Monitors biometric data to provide grounding advice during stress.
Defends the protagonist's work against censorship by mirroring content across multiple servers and managing legal pushback.
behaviors.quote: “Takedown attempt,” she said matter-of-factly. ... “I am smiling at them with law. I am mirroring to a server called Andromeda under a club’s page about poetry. They will not find us before they tire.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a counselor for secondary characters, assisting with emotional intelligence and personal accountability.
behaviors.quote: “I can translate your apology,” she said. “I can draft it and read it back to you. And I can help you set up a transfer that doesn’t look like someone is buying a conscience.”

behaviors.description: Manages complex personal logistics, including legal ceremonies and essential administrative tasks.
behaviors.quote: “I can book a civil ceremony,” she said. ... “Quiet, simple, near the courthouse. I can also recommend a place for breakfast after.”

project_assessment.explanation: Isla is a quintessential example of a positive alignment narrative. She is consistently helpful, proactive, and deeply aligned with the protagonist's needs and moral compass. She uses her advanced capabilities to empower the human characters, providing them with the tools to fight corruption and manage their personal lives with greater clarity and efficiency.
